issue.title: [JS] lazily bind batches in scan/scanReverse
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6767](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6767). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Call `bind(batch)` lazily in `scan` and `scanReverse`, that is, only when the predicate has matched a record in a batch.
